data.approach: Build tools/core/jt as pure bash CLI using sqlite3 CLI. ~250 lines supporting: create, update, close, show, list, ready, dep add/remove/tree, search, init, --version. JSON output via sqlite3 -json. Match bd output format for seamless transition. Add symlink to symlink-tools.sh.

summary: Built tools/core/jt - pure bash+sqlite3 CLI replacement for bd
Supports all required commands: create, update, close, show, list, ready, dep add/remove/tree/cycles, search, init, delete, --version
JSON output via sqlite3 -json + python3 post-processing for nested arrays
Matches bd output format (labels as arrays, dependencies/dependents as objects)
Cycle detection, SQL injection safety, proper error handling
Symlink already handled by existing symlink-tools.sh (core dir auto-links)
reviewFocus: Verify JSON output format matches bd exactly
Test with real .beads/ projects for format compatibility

summary: Implemented pure bash CLI tool 'jt' with SQLite3 backend
Created comprehensive command support including create, update, close, show, list, ready, and dependency management
Implemented JSON output via sqlite3 -json and task ID generation using /dev/urandom
Ensured compatibility with existing agent workflows and output formats

suggestedTasks.title: Add Comprehensive Test Suite for jt CLI Tool
suggestedTasks.description: Develop a robust test suite to validate all jt CLI commands and edge cases. Create bash test scripts that cover each command's functionality, input validation, error handling, and JSON output consistency. Use a testing framework like bats to automate and standardize testing across different scenarios.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability and prevent regressions in the new CLI tool

suggestedTasks.title: Create User Documentation for jt CLI
suggestedTasks.description: Develop comprehensive documentation detailing jt CLI usage, including all supported commands, their arguments, and example workflows. Create a man page and README.md with clear installation instructions, command reference, and usage examples for developers and agents.
suggestedTasks.reason: Facilitate adoption and understanding of the new CLI tool

gotchas: Requires sqlite3 CLI to be installed

documentationNeeds: Add man page for command reference
